about_the_game:
Fantasy Clicker

(Currently in development)
Is a combination between an idle clicker and a rpg.
Battle monsters in a variety of levels inspired by the fantasy theme, collect loot, craft items gain experience for each enemy slain and level up. Increase your power with stats and talents!

Demo

Download the demo to try out the game with limits of:
  • Leaderboards for hero level and ascendacies
  • 3 Expeditions to embark on for more loot and increase your expedition level
  • First 20 levels
  • Offline progress: gain gold, xp and ascendancy points even when your game is closed
  • Ascendancy system
  • 2 Buildings(limited to a few upgrades)
  • 1 Runeword(An, Ce, D) in that order of runes
  • 3 equippable items for your followers
  • 2 craftable weapons - Basic sword with 4 upgradable sword levels and bronze sword with 1 upgrade
  • 4 craftable armor pieces
  • 1 set bonus when you equip all 4 armor pieces
  • A hero xp/leveling/stats/talents system

Features

(work in progress)
  • Variety of different monsters to slay!
  • Fantasy inspired levels with vibrant colors or damp dark caves.
  • Upgrade and equip your 3 heroes to deal more damage and slay enemies faster.
  • Offline progress: gain gold, xp and asncedancy points even when your game is closed
  • Ascendancy system
  • Synergy system (after a certain level threshold of levels is reached you get a buff)
  • Experience/level system with stats to improve.
  • Talent system.
  • Inventory system with lots of resources/items to farm for. Get bags so you can increase your inventory capacity to hold more items.
  • Rune system - farm runes and try to build runewords. (runes are 1 time use, so choose wisely!)
  • Craft system - craft mighty weapons and items to help you fight enemies.
  • City buildings system - buy and upgrade buildings to develop your city to get more gold/resources.
  • Leaderboards - race to see who can reach the top 3 spots.
  • Expeditions system - embark on expeditions with a chance of successfully finding treasures!

Goal

To develop the game alongside the community so it becomes a game that everyone loving the clicker genre can enjoy!

Minimum:

short_description: Fantasy Clicker is an idle clicker game with some RPG elements. Battle different monsters in fantasy inspired levels, gather gold/resources to upgrade your heroes and buildings. Farm experience to level up.
